description:
Since 1995, Peters & Longmuir, PLC has been serving Independence and Northeast Iowa , representing clients In Iowa, federal, and appellate courts. The cornerstone of our success Is the relationship we maintain with each client. We focus on the needs of each client and their particular situation.

Each client brings with them a unique situation. We try to take the time with a client to truly understand our clients' goals and concerns and consider the options which may be available to them. With a focus on the client, we provide Intelligent, informed and cost-effective legal representation. If a client's situation requires more specialized legal expertise, we will work with the client to obtain the best attorney for his situation. Our client-focused approach coupled with a responsive, flexible team approach allows our clients to receive the help they deserve.
